summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's accounts at Deutsche Bank for the month of April 2016. It details various debits and credits, including outgoing transfers, checks paid, and fees incurred, providing insight into Epstein's financial activities during this period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Rites S. McCorquodale
persons.context: Rites S. McCorquodale is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Epstein made multiple outgoing money transfers to Rites S. McCorquodale's account.

events.title: Beginning of Account Summary Period
events.description: The document begins with the account balance as of April 1, 2016.

events.title: End of Account Summary Period
events.description: The document concludes with the ending balance as of April 30, 2016.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details Jeffrey Epstein's account balance at Deutsche Bank, showing a beginning balance of $325,078.33 and an ending balance of $155,848.17.
Significant outgoing transfers include $15,000 to Clarity Custom Inc and $50,000 to Manhattan Motorcars Inc.
Multiple preauthorized debits for payroll fees and utility payments are recorded throughout the month.
Rites S. McCorquodale is noted as a recipient of funds from Epstein's account.
The document includes various fees and charges, totaling $50 for NSF return item fees.
